name: Wind Wizard
description:
WELCOME TO WIND WIZARD!

Use your wind powers to protect your home. Destroy the fireballs and knockback the evil fire spirits. Use dashes for more mobility and a faster reload rate.

Move - WASD

Fire - Left Click

Dash - Space

The four colors chosen for this game were black, white, light blue, and dark blue. This game was made in 3 days for the BenBonk game jam.
